snippet.title: Volgarr the Viking II - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Available now for console & PC! digitaleclipse.com/games/volgarr2
It's been a decade since players faced Volgarr the Viking's brutal and rewarding action/platform gameplay. Now the barbarian king returns in Volgarr the Viking II – older but just as merciless, facing more intense enemies on larger levels in a new adventure that builds on gaming's hardcore history.. New players will find features that make the game more accessible as they learn, but only the most skilled and precise players will see the most glorious of the six possible endings. Rise, warrior – your challenge awaits.

Available for Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4 & 5, Xbox Series X|S & Xbox One, and PC on both Steam and GOG.
